alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Union (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 6:24PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN FRANKLIN COUNTY IN SOUTHEASTERN INDIANA, SOUTHEASTERN UNION COUNTY IN EAST CENTRAL INDIANA AND WESTERN BUTLER COUNTIES IN SOUTHWESTERN OHIO THROUGH 700 PM EDT... At 623 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Brookville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Fairfield, Oxford, Brookville, Ross, Darrtown, Reily, Millville, Scipio, Cedar Grove, Mount Carmel, Mounds State Recreation Area, Collinsville, Okeana, Mixersville, Mcgonigle, Sharptown, St. Charles and Layhigh. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
